About the App

RF Analyzer is an open source spectrum analyzer that lets you use you SDR hardware together with an Android device. A detailed description can be found in the manual. Show the changelog.

Get Beta Releases

If you want to help the developer by testing beta releases you can join the beta program on Google Play:
https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.mantz_it.rfanalyzer

Reporting Bugs

If you find any bugs or translation mistakes or if you want to request a new feature please use the GitHub page of the project:
https://github.com/demantz/RFAnalyzer/issues

Alternatively you could write me an email to rfanalyzerapp@gmail.com.
